typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		CustomerId as integer,
		FullName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: ($modifiedAfter),
	modifiedBefore: ($modifiedBefore),
	entity: 'Customers.cdm.json/Customers',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Customers',
	corpusPath: 'Test_Logical/sm-corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	folderPath: 'Test_Physical/sm-exported/Customers',
	fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy','MM-dd-yyyy','MM.dd.yyyy','yyyy/MM/dd','yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy.MM.dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy.MM.dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss','MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM.dd.yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM.dd.yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM/dd/yyyy','MM-dd-yyyy','MM.dd.yyyy','yyyy/MM/dd','yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy.MM.dd']) ~> CustomersDeltaSource
CustomersDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(CustomerId),
	FullName = last(FullName)) ~> Deduplicated1CustomersDeltaSource
Deduplicated1CustomersDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		IndividualCustomerName = FullName,
		CustomerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> IndividualCustomer
IndividualCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'IndividualCustomer.cdm.json/IndividualCustomer',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'IndividualCustomer',
	folderPath: 'Test_Physical/stdm-exported/IndividualCustomer',
	fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	corpusPath: 'Test_Logical/stdm-corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	truncate: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> IndividualCustomerSink
